data.name: 简易五子棋
data.detailed_description: It's a simple game where two players play chess one after the other until one person plays five pieces to win. Although the rules of this game are simple, they are very wise, and there is a relationship between the first and second hands of the game, and we know that the chances of backgammon first are greater. Because it can be laid out in advance. This game is currently only very early in the game, and later we will update the computer's algorithm in it. Hope to rely on people to rely on their own decision-making, to make the computer battle, can make the computer powerful algorithm to calculate the confrontation, and people only provide directional content, of course, this is only a later version, the current shelves are only very simple games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10210U CPU @ 1.60GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX3070M 8G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
